name: Lavender Link
storyline: Rika is stuck in a dead-end career as the janitor of a dreary research facility in space. What do they research? She couldn't care less. Not until her concern for a co-worker pulls her into some sinister circumstances.
summary: Rika is stuck in a dead-end career as the janitor of a dreary research facility in space. What do they research? She couldn't care less. Not until her concern for a co-worker pulls her into some sinister circumstances.
